languages.text: "Что он существует. Что мой Кабал обнаружил его, беспомощного и недвижимого, не способного защитить своих сыновей и дочерей. Что в шпиле Опустошительной бури начали появляться пленники-сородичи, источники утонченной и прелестной боли. Я слишком много времени проводил за пределами нашей обители, чтобы узнать больше... но и этого хватило, чтобы соблазнить Ирлиэт ложной надеждой".

"I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."
languages.original_text: "Что он существует. Что мой Кабал обнаружил его, беспомощного и недвижимого, не способного защитить своих сыновей и дочерей. Что в шпиле Опустошительной бури начали появляться пленники-сородичи, источники утонченной и прелестной боли. Я слишком много времени проводил за пределами нашей обители, чтобы узнать больше... но и этого хватило, чтобы соблазнить Ирлиэт ложной надеждой".

I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were fonts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were fonts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were fonts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

"I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

languages.text: «Sé que existe. Sé que mi Kábala lo encontró, inmóvil e indefenso, incapaz de proteger a su progenie. Sé que la gente de Yrliet empezó a aparecer prisionera en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, donde servían como fuente de un dolor exquisito y delicioso. Pasaba demasiado tiempo fuera de nuestro hogar como para descubrir más... pero eso bastaba para tentar a Yrliet con una falsa esperanza».
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que existe. Sé que mi Kábala lo encontró, inmóvil e indefenso, incapaz de proteger a su progenie. Sé que la gente de Yrliet empezó a aparecer prisionera en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, donde servían como fuente de un dolor exquisito y delicioso. Pasaba demasiado tiempo fuera de nuestro hogar como para descubrir más... pero eso bastaba para tentar a Yrliet con una falsa esperanza».

languages.text: “我知道它确实存在。我知道我的阴谋团发现了它，它一动不动，根本无力保护它的儿女。我知道，伊莉耶特的族人渐渐地出现在狂风阴谋团的尖塔中，在那里享受着精巧而愉悦的痛苦。我在科摩罗之外呆得太久，无法知道更多事情……但那虚假的希望，已经足够让伊莉耶特上钩了。”
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: “我知道它确实存在。我知道我的阴谋团发现了它，它一动不动，根本无力保护它的儿女。我知道，伊莉耶特的族人渐渐地出现在狂风阴谋团的尖塔中，在那里享受着精巧而愉悦的痛苦。我在科摩罗之外呆得太久，无法知道更多事情……但那虚假的希望，已经足够让伊莉耶特上钩了。”

languages.text: 「存在は知っている。俺の陰謀団が、それが無力で動くこともできず、子供たちを守ることのできないものだということを突き止めた。ユリエットのキンが、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔に、囚人として現れはじめていることは知っている。そこで彼らは激しく、歓喜溢れる痛みの源となる。俺はそのことを調べるのに、あまりに多くに時間を費やしてしまった…だがユリエットを偽りの希望で誘惑するには十分な時間だった」
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: 「存在は知っている。俺の陰謀団が、それが無力で動くこともできず、子供たちを守ることのできないものだということを突き止めた。ユリエットのキンが、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔に、囚人として現れはじめていることは知っている。そこで彼らは激しく、歓喜溢れる痛みの源となる。俺はそのことを調べるのに、あまりに多くに時間を費やしてしまった…だがユリエットを偽りの希望で誘惑するには十分な時間だった」

languages.text: « Je sais qu'il existe. Je sais aussi que ma Kabale l'a trouvé, désarmé et à l'arrêt, incapable de protéger ses fils et filles. Et je sais que les congénères d'Yrliet ont commencé à affluer dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, où ils ont été faits prisonniers et soumis à des tourments absolument exquis. J'ai passé trop de temps hors de notre territoire pour en apprendre davantage... mais c'était amplement suffisant pour circonvenir Yrliet en lui donnant de faux espoirs. »
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais qu'il existe. Je sais aussi que ma Kabale l'a trouvé, désarmé et à l'arrêt, incapable de protéger ses fils et filles. Et je sais que les congénères d'Yrliet ont commencé à affluer dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, où ils ont été faits prisonniers et soumis à des tourments absolument exquis. J'ai passé trop de temps hors de notre territoire pour en apprendre davantage... mais c'était amplement suffisant pour circonvenir Yrliet en lui donnant de faux espoirs. »

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass es existiert. Ich weiß, dass meine Kabale es gefunden hat, hilflos und stationär, nicht in der Lage, seine Söhne und Töchter zu beschützen. Ich weiß, dass Yrliets Verwandtschaft als Gefangene im Turm des plündernden Sturms auftauchte, wo sie Quell exquisiter, köstlicher Schmerzen war. Ich habe zu viel Zeit außerhalb der Grenzen unserer Heimat verbracht, um mehr zu erfahren ... doch das war genug, um Yrliet mit falscher Hoffnung zu ködern."
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass es existiert. Ich weiß, dass meine Kabale es gefunden hat, hilflos und stationär, nicht in der Lage, seine Söhne und Töchter zu beschützen. Ich weiß, dass Yrliets Verwandtschaft als Gefangene im Turm des plündernden Sturms auftauchte, wo sie Quell exquisiter, köstlicher Schmerzen war. Ich habe zu viel Zeit außerhalb der Grenzen unserer Heimat verbracht, um mehr zu erfahren ... doch das war genug, um Yrliet mit falscher Hoffnung zu ködern."

languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were fonts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

languages.text: "Var olduğunu biliyorum. Kabalımın onu çaresiz, sabit, evlatlarını koruyamayacak hâlde bulduğunu biliyorum. Yrliet'in soydaşlarının Müfteris Kasırga kulesine götürülüp tarifsiz lezzette ızdıraplara gark edildiğini de biliyorum. Dahasını öğrenmek adına yurdumuz sınırları dışında onca zaman geçirdim... Gelgelelim bu kadarı, Yrliet'in boş ümitlere kapılmasına yetti."
languages.original_text: "I know it exists. I know that my Kabal found it, helpless and stationary, unable to protect its sons and daughters. I know that Yrliet's kin began showing up as prisoners in the Reaving Tempest's spire, where they were founts of exquisite, delightful pain. I spent too much time beyond the limits of our home to learn more than that... but that was enough to tempt Yrliet with false hope."

traits.locale_text: "Var olduğunu biliyorum. Kabalımın onu çaresiz, sabit, evlatlarını koruyamayacak hâlde bulduğunu biliyorum. Yrliet'in soydaşlarının Müfteris Kasırga kulesine götürülüp tarifsiz lezzette ızdıraplara gark edildiğini de biliyorum. Dahasını öğrenmek adına yurdumuz sınırları dışında onca zaman geçirdim... Ancak bu kadarı da Yrliet'in boş ümitlere kapılmasına yetti."
